## Description {#details}

Base class for constants with no operands.

These constants have no operands; they represent their data directly. Since they can be in use by unrelated modules (and are never based on GlobalValues), it never makes sense to RAUW them.

Definition at line 53 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>.
